Key Match Events: No other batter crossed 20 runs for Afghanistan
Arshdeep Singh and Jasprit Bumrah picked three wickets each
Axar Patel and Ravindra Jadeja each clinched one wicket
Suryakumar Yadav received the player of the match award
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bat first
Rohit Sharma (c), Virat Kohli, Rishabh Pant (wk), Suryakumar Yadav, Shivam Dube, Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Arshdeep Singh, Jasprit Bumrah were selected for India

Rahmanullah Gurbaz (wk), Ibrahim Zadran, Najibullah Zadran, Hazratullah Zazai, Gulbadin Naib, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Nabi, Rashid Khan (c), Noor Ahmad, Naveen-ul-Haq, Fazalhaq Farooqi were selected for Afghanistan
Rashid Khan said they would prefer to bowl first but happy with their preparations
Rohit Sharma said they would bat first and adapt to the conditions quickly
Post-Match Reflections: India maintained their record of remaining unbeaten against Afghanistan in T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain probability in Barbados is 3% for the match
Barbados weather forecast shows minimal chances of rain throughout the day
